price: The true dominion on that Day belongs to the Most Compassionate[11], and it will be a hard day for the disbelievers.
arabic: ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ٱلۡحَقُّ لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِۚ وَكَانَ يَوۡمًا عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَسِيرٗا
footnotes: [11] On Judgment Day the whole authority will be for Allah alone; whereas, in this world, Allah gave some authority to kings, rulers, etc.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-mul'ku yawma-idhin al-ḥaqu lilrraḥmāni wakāna yawman ʿalā al-kāfirīna ʿasīran
